page.title: 11CLUBS
page.content: On the north side of the River there are no{clubs or societies}even in the village of Rodley. The main place for clubs is Westbury on Severn and they include{Rugby, Cricket, Scouts, Cubs, {Guides}and a{Young Farmers' Club. There is also a club catering for the needs of old people. On the south side the youth of the area ned to travel to Arlingham (not in this block) where there is a{Youth {Club}held once a week. There is also a Women's Institution the village which looks after the female interests in the area.{Skittles and Darts}are played in the pubs throughout the area but in general those interested in sporting activities must look further afield.
